title: 1999/52/EC: Commission Decision of 8 January 1999 amending Decision 97/252/EC drawing up provisional lists of third-country establishments from which Member States are to authorise imports of milk and milk-based products for human consumption (notified under document number C(1998) 4540) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 January 1999 amending Decision 97/252/EC drawing up provisional lists of third-country establishments from which Member States are to authorise imports of milk and milk-based products for human consumption (notified under document number C(1998) 4540) (Text with EEA relevance) (1999/52/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 97/252/EC is supplemented for Iceland, Estonia and Poland by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 January 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
